ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body + <2> Nikon 18-300mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Samyang 500mm Telephoto Lens +
<4> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <5> Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <6> Vivitar 77mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <8> Rokinon 67" Monopod & Case + <9> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> T Mount for Nikon + <13> Instruction Sheet for T-Mount + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body with 18-300mm VR Lens + 500mm Tele Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Backpack + Accessory Kit
